article.title: DRC Awarded $3.7 Million Program Management Task Order With TSA
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Dynamics Research Corporation (DRC) has been awarded a task order with an estimated value of $3.7 million with the Transportation Security Administration (TSA). DRC will provide project and program management support to the TSA's National Explosives Detection Canine Team Program, which deters and detects the introduction of explosives devices into the transportation system.
